name: The Coup Attempt
description: A captain is plotting to overthrow Tony with Junior's backing.
context: Richie Aprile just got out of prison after 10 years. He was a captain under your father and expects to resume his position and influence. He's been openly dismissive of your authority, running his own operations without approval, and undercutting your orders. Your sources tell you he's been meeting with Uncle Junior to discuss replacing you as boss. Your sister Janice has been dating Richie for the past few months.
prompt: Richie is building alliances against you and meeting with Junior. Your sister is dating him. What do you do?
stakes: If you act, your sister loses her boyfriend. If you don't, Richie continues building support.
